column4: I'm trying to download a driver from nvidia so that I can reach 1440x900 on my graphics card. with Ubuntu 7.04, do I select Lunux x86 or linux x64?
i dont think i need to restart my x
nevermind, i think if i actually install ubuntu, it will let me access 1440x900 once it detects my settings, currently i am running off a live cd
yeah that'l help get some config files changed anyway :)
